document.full_text: tens of thousands of finns gathered in the capital helsinki monday to celebrate their first gold medal in world ice hockey in 16 years, a victory that lifted a national mood darkened by political clashes in the past month.
document.title: finns revel in rare ice hockey victory
lines_and_colors: tens of thousands of finns gathered in the capital helsinki monday to celebrate their first gold medal in world ice hockey in 16 years, a victory that lifted a national mood darkened by political clashes in the past month.
